ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank AMETRAMO, the régulos and the traditional healers from Mogovolas district for their collaboration and support providing us information about the plants used for treatment of malaria. We thank the Department of Biological Sciences at Eduardo Mondlane University for the support in the identification of plants. We also thank Professor Virgílio do Rosário, retired Professor from Instituto de Higiene e Medicina Tropical, Universidade Nova de Lisboa for helping to draft and edit the manuscript.
